pilots.name: Outer Rim Patrol

shipAbility.name: Concentrated Batteries
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary, [Torpedo], or [Missile] attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], roll 1 additional die.

pilots.text: The Raider-class corvette is one of the Empire's smallest warships, often used for reconnaissance missions, surgical strikes, or suppressing enemy starfighters with its powerful ordnance.
